local_intent: Detect the drawer handle, align and orient the wrist, then close the gripper to establish a stable grasp on the handle.
assumptions: Target handle is named 'drawer_handle' and reachable after alignment.
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase of the global plan: detect handle with retries, open and align, set yaw to 90, close gripper at force 20, and verify grasp stability before proceeding.
